fullDescription.intro: Reader for Parquet files. It reads either single files or all files in a given directory.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: The file or directory to read.

tab.name: Type Mapping
tab.description: Change the Parquet to KNIME type mapping configuration for subsequent nodes by selecting a KNIME type to the given Parquet Type. The dialog allows you to add new or change existing type mapping rules.
tab.option: Columns that match the given name (or regular expression) and Parquet type will be mapped to the specified KNIME type.
Columns that match the given Parquet type will be mapped to the specified KNIME type.

ports.inPort: Optional port for a remote connection.
ports.outPort: Data table containing the data of the Parquet file.
